reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that information is collected in the apps, albeit not sensitive personal information.
reply.reference: Information collected in our Apps - We DO NOT collect any other sensitive personal information such as e-mail address, user name or password. URL: http://www.hamsterforce.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

source_documents.excerpt:
| Hamster Force is committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. The purpose of this privacy policy is to inform you about information we collect and how that information is used. |
| Information collected in our Apps |
| - We DO NOT collect any other sensitive personal information such as e-mail address, user name or password. |
| - Name and email address will be required for technical support follow-up. |
|

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Name and email address for technical support follow-up

content: Name and email address for technical support follow-up

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that only name and email address may be collected for technical support follow-up, indicating the data type collected by the app in this scenario.
reply.reference: Name and email address will be required for technical support follow-up. URL: http://www.hamsterforce.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the information collected is used to improve the performance and reliability of the apps, with a specific mention that information obtained via technical support will only be used for reply follow-up.
reply.reference: Information is used to improve performance and reliability of our Apps. We DO NOT share, sell or give the information to other persons or companies. We DO NOT share your personal information to any third parties. Information collected via Technical support will only be used for reply follow-up. URL: http://www.hamsterforce.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the user can set their browser to reject or delete cookies at any time, providing a means to opt out of data collection.
reply.reference: You can set your browser to reject or delete the cookies in any time. URL: http://www.hamsterforce.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that they do not share, sell, or give the information to other persons or companies and they do not share personal information with any third parties. Hence, the app does not share data with third parties.
reply.reference: We DO NOT share, sell or give the information to other persons or companies. We DO NOT share your personal information to any third parties. URL: http://www.hamsterforce.com/PrivacyPolicy.html
